explains: n. 不倒翁（玩具）；杂技演员；翻筋斗者；一杯的容量；滚筒；平底玻璃杯

sentences.en: He pulled out this dusty old rock tumbler.
sentences.cn: 他拖出了这个布满灰尘的旧磨石机。

sentences.en: A bumblebee, if dropped into an open tumbler, will be there until it dies, unless it is taken out.
sentences.cn: 如果把一只大黄蜂丢进一只敞口平底玻璃杯里，不把它拿出来，它会在那儿一直呆到死。

sentences.en: Most common pin and tumbler locks can be picked with a little luck and finesse—so before you call a locksmith, try this.
sentences.cn: 用一点运气加上策略，大多普通的弹子锁都能被打开——所有在你请锁匠之前，尝试一下这个。
